title: Riot :D Zed Skin FEEDBACK pls riot

embed.description: Zed Skin: Custom Skin created by iTBagT. This skin is rated: Good

body: I think they should make this zed skin because zed only has 2 skins and is a op champ. this should be a legendary skin, sound effects, ability effects (when he throws shurikens and shadow slashes). Holographic Shadows, his voice should sound a bit like yasuo's but his own voice which would be awesome!! and the body of zed should be greyish like the Shockblade Zed but holographic. Reply Riot. Take this into account and if you make this skin. i will be amazed.........{{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:238}}  FOR LIFE!

>
> I think they should make this zed skin because zed only has 2 skins

Umm doesnt he have like 3 or 4 now

yeah hes got 3
classic
shockblade 
and skt1
tho i think the skt one is vaulted now

That is no way a legendary skin standard I am sorry.

Because besides the 2 shurikens on the back, everything else looks like a low quality recolouring for me.

As the original looks something like this:

http://img2.wikia.nocookie.net/__cb20121102022456/leagueoflegends/images/thumb/d/de/Zed_Render.png/215px-Zed_Render.png

it could just be a normal then with the holographic shadows and stuff :) + its just a idea that link i got it from so i just added a few things to make it look way better if it was made u knw what im saying.
yeah i can agree with you there mate
I think project skin would be good like yasuo;s skin. Or a eternum skin like rek sai and nocturne.
Found this and looked AWESOME!! I would buy Zed just for this skin >>
I was thinking Holographic Zed would be along the lines of Pulsefire Ezreal's visual effects or PROJECT: Yasuo skin. With the blade being holographic, as well as the shadows.
Yeah thats what i was aiming for..
